column2: @BTCDCA The bill was just introduced in the House. I wonder if #ICO investor funds are being diverted to lobbying efforts? 🧐🤔
@jrichlive Excellent. The ICO became the small IPO. Now we have a bigger mess. The next phase of IPO’s has to be more investor friendly.
